programme.title: Grizzly
programme.desc: An 18-foot killer grizzly terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a park ranger to stop the slaughter.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: Stepfather II
programme.desc: After escaping the insane asylum in which he was incarcerated, the Stepfather impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient and her young son.

programme.title: Stepfather III
programme.desc: A suspicious youth utilises his computer skills to learn the true identity of the menacing figure romancing his mother.

programme.title: Horror Bites
programme.desc: Small tales, big terror... In this Horror Bites marathon, bite-sized stories deliver spine-chilling scares in under 20 minutes. From twisted encounters to nightmarish twists, these short horrors pack a punch, proving that sometimes the scariest tales come in small doses.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Count Dracula's Great Love
programme.desc: Five stranded travelers are forced to take refuge in the legendary Castle Dracula.

programme.title: Better Watch Out
programme.desc: While babysitting at Christmas, Ashley is forced to defend herself and the child against unwelcome intruders.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Sorority House Massacre
programme.desc: College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

programme.title: Nightbreed
programme.desc: Boone may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.
